2700811819302448870.Text: Sinnammu thinks she is punishing me by sending me here to Sadrith Mora. Let her keep thinking that.

1260566011259214231.Text: Our warriors caught an escaped slave. I showed him kindness. I brought him food and water in secret. When the warriors began speaking of killing him to make a rug for the Ashkhan's tent, I freed him. I wanted to follow him, to go with him to the endless sands he spoke of, but I could not leave the Ahemmusa. Wise Woman Sinnammu gave me this task as a lesson.
